class.name: DVThemePieStyle
class.brief_description: Style resource that defines defaults for pie and donut chart presentation.
class.description: DVThemePieStyle provides per-theme defaults for [DV_PieChart] such as label alignment, center text colors, and animation speed. Adjust these values once to ensure all pie charts in your UI share the same visual language.

method.name: get_show_center_value
method.description: Returns whether the theme instructs pies to render the aggregate value in the center.

method.name: set_show_center_value
method.description: Sets whether the formatted center value should be shown by default.

signal.name: theme_changed
signal.description: Emitted when a property changes to notify pie charts that their styling should be refreshed.
